data.headline: Nasdaq climbed nearly 1% on strong tech sector performance, outpacing other major indexes
bullets: S&P 500 advanced about 0.5%, moving closer to record highs
Russell 2000 rose roughly 0.8%, while the Dow held just above its recent 50,000 milestone
Oracle surged over 9â€“10% on AI-driven cloud optimism and analyst upgrades linked to big tech capital spending
Nvidia and semiconductor stocks recovered following bullish analyst calls
Under Armour jumped approximately 20% after a Q3 earnings beat
AppLovin, Ciena, Kroger, Nexstar, and Tegna all traded higher on individual catalysts
Hims & Hers and Kyndryl came under pressure amid sector rotation
Low trading volumes, a softer dollar, and stabilizing bitcoin and precious metals provided additional support
Traders await delayed jobs and CPI data later this week, with no major economic releases today
